## About the project

This project aims to develop a web application that retrieves data from the Pokemon API using TypeScript, implementing reactive programming with RXJS and leveraging React context for state management.

[![live demo link](https://img.shields.io/badge/Live%20Demo-00B9ae?style=for-the-badge)](https://idembele70.github.io/pokedex/)

[![design of the app](./public/assets/design/Desktop.png)](https://idembele70.github.io/pokedex/)
